attributes.action: Stop taking grazing rights away from Marsh Farm in Essex!
attributes.additional_details: As it means than some of the beloved bigger animals get sent off to the meat market, just so humans can build more human homes whilst eradicating animals’ homes. The animals were here first, they should be protected and not persecuted.
attributes.background: Marsh Farm is a place where children and families get to see, touch and enjoy wonderful animals. We need to protect these innocent animals and not be taking the grazing rights away. Animals need not suffer!

rejection.details:
This sounds like a local issue, and not something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
